| HistoryText             = A group of former criminals and mercenaries who have become wealthy New York businessmen who are bored of their current money-making movements and then gather together to create new wages to make between them. Their club came to an end when they decided to wage on who was able to destroy [[Bruce Banner (Earth-616)|Hulk]], but Hulk easily defeated one by one the club members and even their robots.{{r|Incredible Hulk Annual Vol 1 9}}
